testcase.classname: Automate end to end Buy Order functionality
testcase.name: Order Tshirt
testcase.system-out: Given User clicks the website...............................................passed When User clicks signin button..............................................passed And User enters email and password under Already Registered.................passed Then User clicks the signin button..........................................passed Given User enters their account.............................................passed When User moves cursor over Women's link....................................passed And User clicks on T-shirts.................................................passed And User hovers mouse on second product.....................................passed And User clicks on More button..............................................passed And User clicks the Increase quantity button to 2...........................passed And User Selects size as L..................................................passed And User selects the color..................................................passed And User clicks the Add to cart button......................................passed Then User clicks the proceed to checkout button.............................passed
